strings.schematron.title: BGDI
strings.deTitleRequired: Data Identification / Citation / title is required and requires a german translation
strings.frTitleRequired: Data Identification / Citation / title is required and requires a french translation
strings.deAltTitleRequired: Data Identification / Citation / alternate title is required and requires a german translation
strings.deAltTitleMaxLength: German alternate title is too long, max length is 30
strings.frAltTitleRequired: Data Identification / Citation / alternate title is required and requires a french translation
strings.frAltTitleMaxLength: French alternate title is too long, max length is 30
strings.deAbstractRequired: Data Identification / abstract is required and requires a german translation
strings.frAbstractRequired: Data Identification / abstract is required and requires a french translation
strings.pointOfContactRequired: Data Identification / Point of Contact element is required
